input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2

Product specifications:
Sizzix original die
2.75H x 4.75W - Small Dies
Medium Dies- 4.75 x 2.75
Steel-rule construction
Can cut up to 3 sheets of cardstock; fabric foam; magnet; metallic foil; photos; vellum; and sandpaper
Compatible with the original sizzix machine and the bigkick and big shot machines
input_text.Response A: This die is perfect for creating fun and unique designs! With its bold and crisp edges, it can cut through multiple layers of material at once, making crafting quick and easy. The possibilities are endless with this versatile tool!
input_text.Response B: Do you want to make large squares that are both beautiful and precise? Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2 will give you the perfect square for your projects! Its steel-rule construction allows you to cut through multiple layers of material without any problems. It comes in a small size (2.75H x 4.75W) and a medium size (4.75 x 2.75), which makes it versatile enough to use for various projects. This die is compatible with the original Sizzix machine as well as the BigKick and Big Shot machines, giving you more options to create your designs. With Ellison Sizzix Originals Die-Large Squares #2, you can create perfect squares for your scrapbooking, card making, and other paper crafting projects!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
